nodes.text: A Widowmaker was a maneuver used to remain hidden in a starfighter, performed by landing the starship on a larger one, such as a freighter, allowing the fighter to remain hidden. When attempting to bypass First Order scans while leaving the Colossus to investigate a star system, Kazuda Xiono carried out a Widowmaker with the Fireball, landing on a freighter as Poe Dameron held onto the outside of the ship.
